sentences.en: Large militaristic legions were formed and gained the edge in covert political and power.
sentences.cn: 大型军国主义军团建立起来,并在政治权力领域取得了优势.

sentences.en: The schools of Japan performs militaristic education.
sentences.cn: 以军国主义教育为内容的学校教育.

words.tran_cn: 军事化的；军国主义化的
军国主义；尚武精神，好战态度；职业军人的精神
军事化；军国主义化；黩武主义的提倡
军队化，军国化，鼓吹军国主义（militarize的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_en: Militaristic is used to describe groups, ideas, or policies which support the strengthening of the armed forces of their country in order to make it more powerful
